channel.title: Proofs on Courtney R. Gibbons
channel.description: Recent content in Proofs on Courtney R. Gibbons

item.title: How to study for Linear Algebra exams
item.description: For math exams in general, it can be useful to form a study group to talk over problems and solutions before the exams. It’s also useful to retry problems you’ve seen on homeworks, quizzes, and writing assignments (without looking at your previous attempt or the graders’ comments) to figure out what you need to focus on studying. Prof. Gibbons’ Linear Algebra exams should take you about 90 minutes to complete. The format:
